data.title: Krept & Konan - The Long Way Home

data.text:
Krept & Konan

The Long Way Home

CD

£11.99

This item hasn't been updated for over a year. We believe the item to be available, but that might not necessarily be the case.

If you need to know before ordering, contact us via @BanquetRecords on Twitter or send us an email shop@banquetrecords.com.

Anticipated debut album from UK hip hop duo Krept & Konan

The record is a true representation of their signature mash up of UK and US styles featuring a massive roster of collaborations including Rick Ross, Skepta, Wiz Khalifa, Ed Sheeran, YG, Emeli Sandé and Jeremih to name but a few. Krept & Konan are currently spearheading a new wave of UK hip hop and grime; standing as forerunners in their scene and commanding a huge fan base that pushed their last mixtape into the top 20 – the highest ranking unsigned release in British chart history.
